languages.text: "Никчемные предатели были захвачены при попытке саботировать работу реакторной. Неверные повинны в измене..."
"These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."
languages.original_text: "Никчемные предатели были захвачены при попытке саботировать работу реакторной. Неверные повинны в измене..."

traits.locale_text: "The wretched traitors were captured in the act of attempting to sabotage the operation of the reactor room. The infidels are guilty of treason..."
"The wretched traitors were captured in the act of attempting to sabotage the operation of the reactor room. The infidels are guilty of treason..."
"These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

"These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

languages.text: « Ces misérables ont été surpris en train d'essayer de saboter le réacteur. Ils sont coupables de trahison... »
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

traits.locale_text: « Ces misérables ont été surpris en train d'essayer de saboter le réacteur. Ils sont coupables de trahison... »

languages.text: «Descubrimos a estos viles apóstatas tratando de sabotear el reactor. Son culpables de traición...».
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrimos a estos viles apóstatas tratando de sabotear el reactor. Son culpables de traición...».

languages.text: “这些邪恶的叛教者打算破坏反应堆，被我们当场抓获。他们犯下了叛国罪……”
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

traits.locale_text: “这些邪恶的叛教者打算破坏反应堆，被我们当场抓获。他们犯下了叛国罪……”

languages.text: 「この哀れな背教者たちは、原子炉に妨害工作を行おうとして捕まった。彼らは反逆罪を犯している…」
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

traits.locale_text: 「この哀れな背教者たちは、原子炉に妨害工作を行おうとして捕まった。彼らは反逆罪を犯している…」

languages.text: "Diese verfluchten Apostaten wurden dabei erwischt, wie sie den Reaktor sabotieren wollten. Sie sind des Verrats schuldig ..."
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."

traits.locale_text: "Diese verfluchten Apostaten wurden dabei erwischt, wie sie den Reaktor sabotieren wollten. Sie sind des Verrats schuldig ..."

languages.text: "Bu sefil dönekler, reaktöre sabotaj yapmaya çalışırken yakalandı. İhanetten suçlular..."
languages.original_text: "These wretched apostates were caught trying to sabotage the reactor. They are guilty of treason..."
